content: sweet crochet coasters featuring a heart border these coasters whip up quickly and are a practical relaxing and satisfying project make with one colour multiple colours an ombre colourway or with mix of variegated and solid colours the options are endless perfect for gifting with a pretty mug or coffee keep cup for valentines day for any other special occasion or as a thoughtful gift and for pick your coaster combo market stall stock pattern details * skill level intermediate * yarn dk/8ply/cat 3 weight yarn ~8-10g/0 3oz per coaster worsted/10ply/cat 4 weight yarn can also be used for larger sized coasters low-pill or non-pill easy wash fibre such as cotton cotton blends bamboo blends and certain acrylics * hook use yarn label instructions as a guide for selecting hook size swatch to determine the optimal hook size for your gauge coaster size ~13-14cm/5 25-5 75in in diameter * gauge specific gauge not required * stitch terminology us refer to abbreviations and special stitch instructions * pattern synopsis constructed in the round using a combination of chain double_crochet 2dccl 2trcl tr3tog and slip_stitch * social media share tag me @thecrochetfix #heartstrungcoasters
